text: Lorenzo Taliaferro (December 23, 1991December 16, 2020) was an American football fullback. He played college football at Coastal Carolina. He was drafted by the Baltimore Ravens in 2014. He was born in Yorktown, Virginia. Taliaferro died on December 16, 2020 in Williamsburg, Virginia from a heart attack, aged 28. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American football fullbacks Category:Sportspeople from Virginia
title: Lorenzo Taliaferro
